references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it demonstrates dexterous manipulation using a robot hand, a key focus of the current research.

references.paper_title: A system for general in-hand object re-orientation

references.paper_title: D-grasp: Physically plausible dynamic grasp synthesis for hand-object interactions
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it focuses on dynamic grasp synthesis, a crucial aspect of dexterous manipulation.

references.paper_title: Learning dexterous manipulation for a soft robotic hand from human demonstrations
references.reason: This paper is important as it explores learning dexterous manipulation from human demonstrations, a methodology directly relevant to this research.
